content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please review information about JIRA/KB synchronization with UPSA described in KB article:\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://sharepoint.epam.com/project/epm-help/KB/UPSA-JIRA%20synchronization.aspx\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"https://sharepoint.epam.com/project/epm-help/KB/UPSA-JIRA%20synchronization.aspx\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This means that in order to add person to JIRA Project/KB space, PM/PC should add this person to UPSA Resource Plan with required role and perform “Team Sync” action. Then person will automatically be added to corresponding prj_XXX-YYY_<role> group.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please review information about roles in JIRA described in KB article:\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://sharepoint.epam.com/project/epm-help/KB/Roles%20in%20JIRA.aspx\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"https://sharepoint.epam.com/project/epm-help/KB/Roles%20in%20JIRA.aspx\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please also review p.2.5 from this document( Grant a user access to existing Project/Space) and 6-7 (Add a group /user/admin (Not Customer) to a project in JIRA and “Add a group, user, admin to a space in confluence”\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://sharepoint.epam.com/project/epm-help/Shared%20Documents/PMC%20Instructions/EPM-HELP_JIRA_Confluence_and_Crowd.doc?Web=1\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"https://sharepoint.epam.com/project/epm-help/Shared%20Documents/PMC%20Instructions/EPM-HELP_JIRA_Confluence_and_Crowd.doc?Web=1\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
